mapper.insert: insert into tbl_PowerModule ( pm_chargeSerialNo, pm_PowerModuleName, pm_output_voltage, pm_output_current, pm_a_voltage, pm_b_voltage, pm_c_voltage, pm_a_current, pm_b_current, pm_c_current, pm_temperature ) values ( #{chargeSerialNo}, #{PowerModuleName}, #{output_voltage}, #{output_current}, #{a_voltage}, #{b_voltage}, #{c_voltage}, #{a_current}, #{b_current}, #{c_current}, #{temperature} )
mapper.update: update tbl_PowerModule set pm_PowerModuleName=#{PowerModuleName}, pm_output_voltage=#{output_voltage}, pm_output_current=#{output_current}, pm_a_voltage=#{a_voltage}, pm_b_voltage=#{b_voltage}, pm_c_voltage=#{c_voltage}, pm_a_current=#{a_current}, pm_b_current=#{b_current}, pm_c_current=#{c_current}, pm_temperature=#{c_current} where pk_PowerModuleid=#{pkPowerModuleid}
mapper.select: select pk_PowerModuleid, pm_chargeSerialNo, pm_PowerModuleName, pm_output_voltage, pm_output_current, pm_a_voltage, pm_b_voltage, pm_c_voltage, pm_a_current, pm_c_current, pm_temperature from tbl_PowerModule where pm_chargeSerialNo=#{SerialNo}
